entry.title: 3M SLS - 3M ScotchCode Self-Laminating Write-On Wire Marker Dispenser SLS, 49653, 0.15 in - 0.49 in wire O.D., 1 in x 2.5 in (2.54 cm x 6.35 cm) SLS 7000058136
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 50.28

[shortdesc]

3M ScotchCode Self-Laminating Write-On Wire Marker Dispenser SLS, 49653, 0.15 in - 0.49 in wire O.D., 1 in x 2.5 in (2.54 cm x 6.35 cm)

  • 3M™ ScotchCode™ Self-Laminating Write-On Wire Marker Dispenser is a large, wire marker dispenser that comes with 3M™ ScotchCode™ Write-On Wire Marker Tape and one 3M™ ScotchCode™ Marker Pen
  • This dispenser ensures easy identification of wire and cable, as well as household, automotive, plumbing and sporting equipment
  • The convenient and self-laminating wire marker offers a protective shield over the legend
  • The uniquely designed dispenser features a durable plastic construction, which safeguards the die-cut adhesive markers
  • It also includes a tape that has transparent vinyl film with an acrylic, pressure-sensitive adhesive for firm adhesion
  • The tape withstands a wide temperature range of -40 to 176 degrees Fahrenheit (-40 to 80 degrees Celsius), making it ideal for industrial electrical applications.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Dispenses self-laminating wire markers
  • Acrylic, pressure-sensitive adhesive ensures firm adhesion
  • Application temperature 50°F to 120°F (10°C to 49°C)
  • Durable plastic construction
  • Includes SLS tape and 1 SMP pen
  • Marking area measures 1 in x 2.125 in (2.54 cm x 5.4 cm)
  • RoHS 2011/65/EU Compliant‎
    		•

entry.title: 3M 8991-1X72-BLU - 8991 Blue 1 in x 72 Yd 36/Cs 8991-1x72-Blu 7000049778
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 11.84

[shortdesc]

8991 BLUE 1 IN X 72 YD 36/CS

  • Thin and conformable, 3M™ Polyester Tape 8991 is a general purpose tape that excels in high temperature masking operations such as powder coat painting
  • Coated with a silicone adhesive, this tape bonds to a variety of difficult surfaces
  • It is chemical resistant and performs under a wide range of temperatures and environments.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country China

    Product Information

  • Works in demanding conditions and high temperatures ranging from -6°F (-5°C) to 4°F (24°C)
  • Clean removal during high-temperature applications including powdercoat masking, flashbreaker, and bag sealing applications
  • Polyester film offers excellent thermal and chemical resistance while maintaining flexibility
  • Silicone adhesive provides clean removal from a variety of surfaces
  • Translucent blue backing provides easy identification and positioning
  • Waterproof and easily removable
    		•

3M Polyester Film Tape, 850, black, 1.5 in x 72.0 yd x 1.9 mil (3.8 cm x 65.8 m x 0.0 mm)

  • This tape is available in various colours, as well as a transparent.

    Product Information

    Brand 3M

  • Temperature resistance enables tape to perform in high temperature operations
  • Transparent and silver versions meet a variety of aerospace specifications
  • Waterproof and easily removable

entry.title: 3M 483-1X36-BLK - 3M Polyethylene Tape 483 Black, 1 in x 36 yd 5.3 mil, 36 per case Bulk 483-1X36-BLK 7000048441
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 22.59

[shortdesc]

3M(TM) Polyethylene Tape 483 Black, 1 in x 36 yd 5.3 mil, 36 per case Bulk

  • Constructed with an extremely conformable backing, 3M™ Polyethylene Tape 483 is a 5-mil (0.13 mm) tape designed to be used in a wide variety of general purpose applications, including sealing, holding, coding, moisture proofing and protecting
  • This tape is coated with a rubber adhesive that bonds well and removes cleanly from most surfaces
  • 3M™ Polyethylene Tape 483 is available in a variety of vivid colors.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Extremely flexible backing enables tape to stretch and conform to textured and irregular surfaces
  • Polyethylene backing has a low water vapour transmission rate and provides good solvent and alkali resistance
  • Rubber adhesive bonds well and removes cleanly from most surfaces
  • Vivid colors and smooth backing provide excellent glossy appearance
  • Vivid colours and smooth backing provide excellent glossy appearance
  • Black tape has excellent UV resistance and can be used outdoors for up to 12 months
  • Waterproof and easily removable
    		•
